Metra Alert  - The Millennium Station elevator temporarily out of service

The Millennium Station elevator is temporarily out of service. Recommended alternative accessible locations are Van Buren Street and South Water Street Entrance. Metra will provide updated information once service has been restored.
http://metrarail.com/metra/en/home.html?Twitter=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Category=Elevator
Metra Alert  - The Homewood east elevator not accessible; station under construction

The Homewood East elevator is temporarily not accessible due to construction on the east side of the station. Recommended alternative accessible locations are Calumet and Flossmoor. Metra will provide  updated information once service has been restored.
http://metrarail.com/metra/en/home.html?Twitter=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Category=Elevator
Metra Alert  - The Kenosha elevator temporarily out of service
The Kenosha elevator is temporarily out of service. Recommended alternative accessible location is Winthrop Harbor. Metra will provide  updated information once service has been restored.
http://metrarail.com/metra/en/home.html?Twitter=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Category=Elevator
Metra Alert  - The Homewood Platform elevator temporarily out of service

The Homewood Platform elevator is temporarily out of service. Recommended alternative accessible locations are Flossmoor and Calumet. Metra will provide  updated information once service has been restored.
http://metrarail.com/metra/en/home.html?Twitter=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1
Metra Alert  - Inbound trains to Chicago will board from the temporary platform north of Lawrence at Ravenswood.
Attention Ravenswood Customers, inbound trains to Chicago will board from the temporary platform north of Lawrence.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF- #1257 express to Main St.

Train #1257 scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 4:40 PM, will express from Chicago Union Station to Downers Grove-Main Street and make all stops to Aurora due to Amtrak Switch problems. Please visit metra.com for current delay information.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/SWS?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
SWS #815 will not operate
SWS-Train #815 scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 4:27 PM, will not operate due to Amtrak Switch problems. Train #817 will be the next train making all stops to Manhattan.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPW Train 49, Delayed 15-20 Min.
Outbound train #49, scheduled to arrive Elburn at 6:25 PM - May be operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to a mechanical problem.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF extensive delays & changes

BNSF inbound/outbound trains may be 30 minutes to extensively delayed, expressing, operating out of sequence and annulled due to ongoing Amtrak switch problems. Please listen to platform announcements for updates and the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/SWS?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
SWS #819 delay, 20 to 30 minutes

SWS train #819 scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 5:12 PM, may be operating 20 to 30 minutes behind schedule due to Amtrak switch problems. Please visit metra.com for current delay information.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/SWS?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
SWS Trains Delayed up to 30mins

Southwest Service trains may be operating up to 30 minutes delayed due to ongoing Amtrak switch problems. Please listen to platform announcements for the location of your train and visit metra.com for schedule information.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/SWS?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
SWS #821 will not operate

SWS train #821, scheduled to arrive Manhattan at 7:02 PM, will not operate due to Amtrak switch problems. Train #819 will accommodate passengers to Manhattan. Please visit metra.com for current delay information.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF#1273 express to Main St.

BNSF Train #1273 scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 5:40 PM, will express from Chicago Union Station to Downers Grove-Main Street and make all stops to Aurora due to Amtrak Switch problems. Please visit metra.com for current delay information.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Homewood East Side Construction Will Begin March 13

Beginning Monday, March 13, access to the Homewood Station from the east will be closed for station construction until Summer 2024.  Access to the boarding platform will be through the Park Avenue entrance ONLY (west side of tracks).

 

Beginning, Monday, March 6, the Pace bus stop will relocate from Harwood Avenue to Park Avenue.  Please allow additional time and use caution near the work zone.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert RI - Brainerd Platform Rehabilitation Will Begin Monday, April 24

Beginning Monday, April 24, the west half of Platform #2 will be closed for rehabilitation.  Customers must use the pedestrian crossing at Loomis Street to access the boarding platforms.  The work will move to the east half of platform #2 and into Platform #1 to complete the project by the end of July.  Please allow additional time to access the in-service portion of the platform.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert RI - Construction begins April 21 at 103rd Street Washington Heights Station.
Metra forces will begin work Friday, April 21 on a major rehab project at the 103rd Street/Washington Heights Station on the Rock Island Line, for more informaiton click here.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert SWS - Trains May Incur Delays Due to Amtrak switch problems at Chicago Union Station

Trains entering and departing Chicago Union station may incur delays due to ongoing Amtrak switch problems. Please view train gate boards and listen to station announcements prior to boarding your train. Updates will be provided as more information becomes available.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1

Metra Alert BNSF - BNSF, Southwest Service, and Heritage Corridor Commuters Can Expect Heavy Congestion at Chicago Union Station

BNSF, Southwest Service, and Heritage Corridor passengers may experience heavy congestion at Chicago Union Station due to Amtrak switch problems. The service disruption plan at Chicago Union Station is being implemented. Please listen to announcements for updated information on train boarding. Please obey instructions from Metra, BNSF and Amtrak personnel and police. Thank you for your cooperation and understanding. To view a map of the loading/staging areas at Chicago Union Station click here.
